==Useful Info==
'''Blazeheart golems''' are constructs created by [[Summon Blazeheart Golem]]. 
*It can only move or attack when the player is adjacent to it. Otherwise, it stops and becomes dormant until you get next to it again.
*Each time the golem attacks, its HP is reduced by 1/3. 
*Upon death, if not dormant, it turns into a [[blazeheart core]].

==History==
*In [[0.31]], this monster was introduced as a part of the [[Summon Blazeheart Golem]] spell.
